item.title: Retail Analytics
item.description: About Retail spans across various industries where business to consumer transactions happen very frequently. In business-to-customer transaction the goods or services move from producer of goods and services. The clear differentiation in the business approach can be seen below: Retail Type| & |Focus Brick & mortar : In-shop experience Online Retailer : Ease of access save Hybrid : Extension of in-shop experiences Retail Segments: Specialty retail Food & beverages Work home, lifestyle General retailing Logistics Area of focus is with the general retailing which sells product in all categories.
